column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Even though some of my friends highly recommend this place I didn't have a good experience. Waiting time is too long ranging from 30 to 45 minutes. You have to order ahead if you want to eat sooner. Also
column2: our pizza was soggy and the sauce was a little salty. Luckily
column3: the girl that took care of us was really nice.
